resources.string: Please set up your Google sync. After that you can select what color your project should have.

This category has not been deleted, it has been deactivated. This is because at least one of its projects have reports attached to them.\n\nProjects with no reports have been deleted. Projects with reports have been deactivated.
Since this project had at least one report attached to it it could not be deleted, it has instead been deactivated. You may choose to reactivate it if you create a new project with the same name.
You need to create a category before creating any projects. Click the menu button.
Remember to report time for today.

string-array.name: ack_list
string-array.item: OrmLite is used for a simple approach to databas mapping. You can find it here: http://ormlite.com/
The TimePreference dialog was borrowed from CommonsWare here: https://github.com/commonsguy/cw-lunchlist/blob/master/19-Alarm/LunchList/src/apt/tutorial/TimePreference.java
Google APIs Client Library for Java. Found here: https://code.google.com/p/google-api-java-client/

string-array.name: delete_or_hide
string-array.item: Delete me and all my data
